name: CosmicDelivery
description:
Cosmic Delivery


Controls

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A - Left

D- Right

W- Up

S - Down

Left Click - Shoot Laser(This can destroy Asteroid)

Right Click-Shoot Laser(This can not destroy  Asteroid)

This Laser will add the velocity of the Asteroid to the player, which increases the speed of the player. This should make the Astrid velocity when hit to 0.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Back Story - You are a driver for the best delivery company in the cosmos! Your mission is to reach your destination within the time shown in the top right.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Future Plans

I had planned to add more features and obstacles, however, I have run out of time for this Game Jam , so I just finished it without adding the other feature;

-Adding Abilities (Controls - Middle Mouse Button)

-ShockWave - Send obstacles away from all direction, but causes the player vehicle to be flipped for 30 seconds.

-WarpSpeed - Send Player a Certain amount of distance closer to the delivery point, but causes the asteroids to come in front and behind the player.

-DestractionRay - Destroys all asteroids in all directions. This will stop asteroids from spawning for about 20 seconds, however, a Huge asteroid will spawn behind and explode after 15 seconds. The player needs to get 500m away from it to avoid being destroyed by it.

-Obstacles 

Satelite, Big Rocks, SpaceShip, Indestructible Rock, Bomb

Credits (These are the 2 Assets I didn't make)
